attributes.action: Make mandatory for everyone to wear a mask (even surgical) in indoor workplaces
attributes.additional_details: There are not yet enough tests, there isn't a vaccine so the only way to be safe at work is to protect each other. Air particles, from scientific studies, stays suspended in the air for a while,that's why 2 meters distance is not enough. This is a way to help the economy and keep people safe.
attributes.background: Making mandatory for everyone to wear a surgical mask in workplaces. 2 meters of distance indoor is not enough to protect workers. If everyone wear a surgical mask everyone is protected.
